SEARCH
Package org.repinskie.service.accountServiceInterface

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
org.repinskie.service.accountServiceInterface.AccountService
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountManager
public class AccountService extends Object implements AccountManager
Service class for managing user accounts. This class implements the AccountManager interface and provides methods to interact with user accounts, including checking balance, depositing money, withdrawing money, and transferring funds between accounts.
